name: Grim Dungeon
description:
Grim Dungeon is a vertical slice of a JRPG project, made with Godot.
Crawl through the dungeon and defeat the final boss by using your abilities intelligently.

Features:

  • Job system where each job grant you a unique ability and affects how your stats progress.
  • Use your support character to debuff your enemies. Taking advantage of the weakness of the enemies will grant you combo points to spend !
  • Inventory management and Shop.
  • Use the Alchemy ability of Soreya or the Throw ability of Zven to unleash new effects !
  • Retro style NES graphics with toggleable CRT filter.

Controls:

  • ENTER (A xbox): Accept
  • BACKSPACE (B xbox): Return
  • ESCAPE (Y xbox): Menu / Show buff and debuff in battle

Length: 30 minutes
